text:
It is the tradition of the club to write off an amount equal to 25% of the subscriptions received as other expenses.

Determine the club's excess of income over expenditure
subject: ACCOUNTS PRINCIPLES OF ACCOUNTS

explanation.text:
Explanation
Revenue = 820,000
miscellaneous = 10% of 820,000
\(\frac{10}{100}\times {820,000}\) = 82,000
miscellaneous expense= 82,000
Expenses = office rent + nepa (light) + salary of staff + miscellaneous
20,000 + 15,000 + 120,000 + 82,000 = 237,000
net income = revenue - expenses
820,000 - 237,000 = 583000
